item.title: Find and replace with a newline in Visual Studio Code
item.author: Author
item.description:
Today I learned How to find and replace with a newline in Visual Studio Code.

In the local searchbox (Ctrl + F) you can insert newlines by pressing Ctrl + Enter.

item.title: Visual Studio Code Keyboard Shortcuts
item.author: Author
item.description:
Today I learned Visual Studio Code Keyboard Shortcuts for Windows, macOs and Linux.

Visual Studio Code lets you perform most tasks directly from the keyboard. This page lists out the default bindings (keyboard shortcuts).
